entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
